A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall the movie is great.The effects are amazing\, all the shots are just beautiful\, and the film was made great. But\, as a star wars movie it came in well under my expectations. I was disappointed by what was included in the film and how Rian Johnson did or didnt answer many of the questions that J.J had left wide open to build off of. Dont get me wrong Rian did tell an amazing unexpected story but there were many thing that could have been taken down different paths. Hopefully episode IX will live up to the expectations that I had for The Last Jedi.
